home.title: Our Story
home.desc:
Nestled among the rolling hills of Italy, there lies a place Taurasi where passion and tradition meet. This is the home of our winery and its secret treasure — a wine cellar filled with the finest wines from our vineyards. 

Our team dedicated itself to crafting the perfect bottles of wine, each a reflection of the land and our people. Our cellar is a testament to our love for the art of winemaking, a place where the finest grapes are carefully tended and transformed into the finest nectars. 

Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Italian winemaking as you sample the rarest and most sought-after bottles

catalog.name: Irpinia Coda di Volpe
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
Pasta with clams, sole meunière, mixed legume soup
catalog.taste:
Tasting note 
White and juicy fruits, suggestions of fresh aromatic herbs. The sage becomes bigger and the taste gets enhanced by captivating notes of pink grapefruit.

catalog.name: TAURASI
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
Large roast dishes, cheese and salamis
catalog.taste:
Tasting note 
It has a ruby red color with orange reflections, intense bouquet of black marasca and violet with hints of spices, black pepper and liquorice, an underground full-bodies, slightly tannic taste.

catalog.name: DESMOS
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
It accompanies fish or meat first courses, haute cuisine fish, white meats and semi-mature cheeses
catalog.taste: Tasting note \It has a bright yellow color with light green shades, floral and fruity scent with citrus notes. In the mouth it is tasty, fresh and mineral with light hints of wood.

catalog.name: FIANO DI AVELLINO
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
Seafood pasta, smoked salmon, tuna steak
catalog.taste:
Tasting note 
The Prince of the winery. Elegant, strong, with the perfect body and big shoulders. On the nose is powerful, rich of ripe and pulpy red fruits, immediately followed by dark spices like cloves and coffee. The long flowery finish is guaranteed.

catalog.name: IRPINIA AGLIANICO
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
Pizza with cheese and bacon, meatloaf, beef burrito, roast-beef
catalog.taste:
Tasting note 
This Aglianico is fun and it is the perfect wine to give a toast to life. It’s gentle and flowery, with generous hints of ripe red fruits. It’s a full bodied red wine, but never loud. The long finish is all played on raspberries, violets and with a surprising hint of rosmary.

catalog.name: IRPINIA FALANGHINA
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
It’s perfect paired with sea food, sushi, pasta with vegetables
catalog.taste:
Tasting note 
The first impact is fresh. Then, an explosion of white flowers. Saltiness and richness, a duet of both crunchy and soft sensations, with a long and enchanting finish of wisteria.

catalog.name: GRECO DI TUFO
catalog.desc:
Food Pairing 
Chicken breast with vegetables, chicken burrito, lobster roll
catalog.taste: Tasting note \Powerful and vibrant, this wine is rich of crispy white fruit and intense yellow flowers. Saltiness and acidity are very high and, at the same time, the long élevage on lees has made our Greco di Tufo round and graceful.
